GSD.description:
loop: Check for overflow while configuring loop

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.292 by commit adf0112d9b8acb03485624220b4934f69bf13369. For more details please see the references link.
